Detailed Description

Contains function that creates average gradient operator.

Contains function that creates ztilt gradient operator.

Function Documentation

dsp* mkgt ( loc_t *  xloc,
loc_t *  ploc,
double *  amp,
loc_t *  saloc,
int  saorc,
double  scale,
double *  displace,
int  do_partial 
)

Returns the transpose of a average gradient operator that converts the OPDs defined on xloc to subapertures defines on saloc with ploc as the intermediate pupil plane.

Parameters:
xloc the grid on which OPDs are defined
ploc the grid on the aperture plan
amp the amplitude on ploc
saloc Coordinate of the subapertures
saorc 0: saloc is the center of the subapertures. 1: saloc is the origin of the subapertures.
scale cone effect
displace displacement due to beam angle (2 vector). similar as accphi routines
do_partial 1: use points that are outside of by close to a subaperture. 0: do not use.

dsp* mkg ( loc_t *  xloc,
loc_t *  ploc,
double *  amp,
loc_t *  saloc,
int  saorc,

double *  displace,
int  do_partial

Returns the transpose of mkgt().
